name: Pincites
headline: Close deals faster with AI for contract negotiation
description: Pincites makes contract negotiations faster and more consistent for legal teams. Using LLMs, Pincites takes a first pass at reviewing contracts, helping lawyers focus on riskiest parts of their negotiations.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:legal; industry:legaltech; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sona Sulakian, Founder
founders.description: Building Pincites (S23) to make contract negotiation faster with AI. Previously a transactional attorney, patent attorney, and a strategic consultant for legal tech.

founders.name: Mariam Sulakian, Founder
founders.description: Building Pincites (S23) to make contract negotiation faster with AI. Previously at GitHub and Meta.

# AI contract review for busy legal teams
Pincites helps in-house teams redline contracts faster and more consistently, right in Microsoft Word.
[Try Pincites free](https://www.pincites.com/<https:/calendly.com/pincites/demo>)[Learn more →](https://www.pincites.com/<#features>)
## Trusted by the legal teams at
## Automate first pass reviews of any contract
Review, redline, and refine contracts effortlessly with an intelligent AI agent tailored to your preferences—fully integrated into Microsoft Word.
### Automate first and third-party paper
Apply your playbook across any contract in 15+ languages for the most comprehensive first-pass review.
### Get AI-based suggestions in real time
Pincites provides redlines and comments as you review your contract, with each suggestion aligned to your contract's context and your style guidelines.
### Leverage AI that learns as you negotiate
With each redline you apply, Pincites will learn your preferred style and preferences to improve your suggestions over time.
### Identify trends and patterns
Pincites will spot trends and patterns across your contract, helping you understand your negotiation strategy and existing redlines to constantly improve your positions.
Apply your playbook across any contract in 15+ languages for the most comprehensive first-pass review.
![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/list-of-checks.png)![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/list-of-checks-dark.png)
Pincites provides redlines and comments as you review your contract, with each suggestion aligned to your contract's context and your style guidelines.
![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/redline-and-comment.png)![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/redline-and-comment-dark.png)
With each redline you apply, Pincites will learn your preferred style and preferences to improve your suggestions over time.
![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/failed-check.png)![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/failed-check-dark.png)
Pincites will spot trends and patterns across your contract, helping you understand your negotiation strategy and existing redlines to constantly improve your positions.
![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/compare-standard.png)![Product screenshot](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/compare-standard-dark.png)
## Your tag-along assistant
Supercharge your legal workflows
Negotiate 10x faster with genAI that's embedded where you work as you work — right in Microsoft Word.
### Revise contracts effortlessly
Identify risks and redline with precision.
### Draft clear, consistent language
Generate new clauses from scratch or draft emails to your counterparty
### Ask and get instant answers
Resolve complex legal questions with AI-powered insights
### Summarize complex terms in seconds
Understand and summarize complex clauses with ease
### Translate seamlessly
Negotiate contracts effortlessly across multiple languages
### Compare against your standard
Compare changes to first party paper against your standard template
## Unlimited expert support
Pincites will build you a custom AI-contract review experience, using your precedents and our expertise. We’re with you every step of the way to help your team adopt AI.
**Our experts assist with:**
Building and updating playbooks as your preferences change
Supporting your team with on-demand experts to modify or update preferences
Training on AI use cases and prompting, tailored to your legal team’s needs
![Screenshot of playbook management dashboard](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/playbook.png)![Screenshot of playbook management dashboard](https://www.pincites.com/static/images/screenshots/playbook-dark.png)
## Scale your legal work with AI agents
Book a demo to see how Pincites can help your team move faster
[Try Pincites free](https://www.pincites.com/<https:/calendly.com/pincites/demo>)
## Footer

generated_description:
Pincites is a fresh player in the legaltech space, founded in 2023 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Summer 2023 batch. Based in Menlo Park, CA, this lean team of three is on a mission: to help legal teams close deals faster through the power of AI-powered contract negotiation.

The core of Pincites' offering is centered on using large language models (LLMs) to bring speed and consistency to contract reviews. The service kicks off by automating the initial pass on reviewing any contract, allowing lawyers to zero in on the more critical parts of negotiations—think of it as a high-tech sidekick that streamlines the mundane tasks.

What really excites about Pincites is its seamless integration with Microsoft Word. This means legal professionals can work in an environment they already know while getting real-time suggestions and AI-generated redlines that align with their specific templates and style guidelines. The platform supports contract reviews in over 15 languages, making it a versatile tool for global legal teams.

As you use Pincites, the system learns from your redlines and preferences, continuously sharpening its suggestions to better fit your style. Moreover, it doesn’t just make suggestions; it also identifies trends in your negotiation strategies—helping you refine your approach over time.

In the current landscape where efficiency is key, Pincites positions itself as not just a tool, but as an essential ally that empowers legal teams to negotiate ten times faster. They also offer extensive expert support to tailor the AI experience to your unique needs and playbooks.

If you’re intrigued and want to see how this can supercharge your legal workflow, you can book a demo or try Pincites for free at their [website](https://www.pincites.com/).

In a nutshell, Pincites is setting out to revolutionize how legal contracts are negotiated, focusing on automation, precision, and continuous learning—all packed into a user-friendly interface. As they continue to evolve, they might just become the go-to solution for legal professionals looking to make sense of the complicated world of contracts.
